title: Re-appointments to the Hospital Authority
content_text:
p>
The Government announced today (March 13) the re-appointment of four serving 
members to the Hospital Authority for a two-year term with effect from April 
1, 2009.  The four members are Prof Lai Kar-neng, Mr Lawrence Lee Kam-hung, Mr Peter 
Lo Chi-lik and Mr Charles Peter Mok. The Secretary for Food and Health, Dr York Chow, thanked all the members for 
their advice and contributions to the Hospital Authority in the past term. The Hospital Authority comprises a chairman, 21 non-official members, three

public officers and one principal officer from the Hospital Authority. The membership is as follows: Chairman:
Mr Anthony Wu Ting-yuk Non-official Members:
Mr Chan Bing-woon
Ms Vivien Chan
Dr Margaret Chung Wai-ling
Prof Fok Tai-fai
Dr Anthony Ho Yiu-wah
Mr Benjamin Hung Pi-cheng
Prof Lai Kar-neng
Ms Lau Ka-shi
Mrs Yvonne Law Shing Mo-han

Mrs Yvonne Law Shing Mo-han
Mr Lawrence Lee Kam-hung
Dr Joseph Lee Kok-long
Mr John Lee Luen-wai
Prof Lee Sum-ping
Ms Queenie Leung Pik-man
Dr Donald Li Kwok-tung
Mr David Lie-A-Cheong Tai-chong
Mr Peter Lo Chi-lik
Mr Charles Peter Mok
Prof George Woo
Mr Stephen Yip Moon-wah
Mr Paul Yu Shiu-tin Public Officers:

Mr Paul Yu Shiu-tin Public Officers:
Permanent Secretary for Food and Health (Health), Ms Sandra Lee
Director of Health, Dr P Y Lam
Deputy Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury (Treasury), Ms Bernadette Linn Hospital Authority Principal Officer:
Chief Executive, Hospital Authority, Mr Shane David Solomon
